text: Memphis Belle is a 1990 war movie. It is about an aircraft named Memphis Belle and its crew. Matthew Modine plays Captain Dennis Dearborn. Billy Zane plays Val. John Lithgow plays Bruce. The movie was released in October 1990. It got mixed reviews from critics. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 movies Category:1990s war movies Category:British war movies Category:American war movies Category:Japanese movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies directed by Michael Caton-Jones Category:Movies set in Tennessee
title: Memphis Belle
